reporting.reporttable.TableQuery: IF @FromDate <= @ToDate BEGIN /* Trims the value of @FromDate to be able to display months in the table. */ SET @FromDate ={%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_DateTrim(@FromDate,'month'); /* Selects the number of orders created in the given months. */ SELECT DATENAME(MONTH,[Date])+', '+ DATENAME(YEAR, [Date]) AS '{$ecommerce.report_month$}', COUNT(OrderDate) AS '{$ecommerce.report_numberoforders$}' FROM -- returns a column of dates, each month in a new row {%DatabaseSchema%}.Func_Analytics_EnsureDates (@FromDate,@ToDate,'month') AS Dates LEFT JOIN COM_Order ON ([Date] <= OrderDate AND DATEADD(MONTH,1,[Date]) > OrderDate) AND OrderSiteID = @CMSContextCurrentSiteID GROUP BY [Date] ORDER BY [Date] DESC END
